name: procRTS
description:
An RTS where the units are all procedurally generated.

You're given 6 different units and a production facility which you can use to create units. The enemy facilities spawn units and do so continuously until destroyed.

wasd to move, q,e to zoom.

Edit: Tried compiling for windows, mac, no luck, and not enough documentation to get anywhere. Not using Haxe again.

(note, not finished or polished)
